title: The Light to My Darkness (The Light to My Darkness #1)
description: From international bestselling author Ivy Smoak comes a romantic suspense that will leave your heart racing.I fell in love with the handsome stranger the first time I ever saw him. A chance encounter on a rainy fall day. And I know he felt the same way. Until suddenly…he didn’t. In the blink of an eye, I lost everything. He stays out late. Hides phone calls. But what hurts the most? He looks at me differently. Like I’m no longer the most important person in his life.I’m determined to get to the bottom of it. Because it’s not just me I have to protect anymore. And it’s because of him that we’re in danger…
author: Ivy Smoak
